dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Several Copyright Violations by URL you Host]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Sunday, November 13, 2005 3:59 PM
To: dpokea@bsn1.net; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Several Copyright Violations by URL you Host]

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Several Copyright Violations by URL you Host
Date:         Sat, 12 Nov 2005 22:42:16 -0600
From:         Darryl Pokea <dpokea@bsn1.net>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC:         Darryl Pokea <dpokea@bsn1.net>



The following URL 70.84.222.194 and 70.84.222.195 that you host has violated
copyright X 2 by posting my articles at his website without my permission or
the permission of my publishers.  He has 100's of many other articles posted
at his website as well by many other authors.  The violations of my articles
are posted several places as follows:
http://www.motivationalmagic.com/articles/relaxation/article_2005_10_22_5056
.html
http://www.motivationalmagic.com/articles/happiness/article_2005_10_23_3038.
html

http://www.motivationalmagic.com/articles/happiness/article_summary.html
/  /*Service:
The Giving and Receiving Are One
<http://www.motivationalmagic.com/articles/happiness/article_2005_10_23_3038
.html>*
/Author: Dr. Darryl *Pokea */
/**/
http://www.motivationalmagic.com/articles/happiness/article_summary.html
/*12
Suggestions That Re-Mind and Reduce Stress
<http://www.motivationalmagic.com/articles/happiness/article_summary.html+Dr
.+Pokea+12+Suggestions+That+Re-Mind+and+Reduce+Stress+&hl=en>*/C
2003 Dr. Darryl Pokea--all rights reserved

Richard Saldan is the name of the individual represented at the website.

Please let me know your intentions to follow up on the removal of these
copyright violations of my articles at the URL that you host.

Dr. Darryl Pokea
www.drpokea.com <http://www.drpokea.com>

--
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
